comments:
Description:
Set highlight/map on crosstab, exception throws out when preview in layout.

Build version:2.2.0.v20070614-1316

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a valid crosstab, bind with one dimension and one measure. 
2. Click on the crosstab, and set highlight/map on the property editor view.
3. Get the attached report design file. Preview, exception throws out.

Expected Result:
Highlight/Map on crosstab works.

Error log:
The following items have errors: 


ReportDesign (id = 1): 
- Expression "org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.api.querydefn.ConditionalExpression@df9411" is invalid.  
Error.InvalidExpressionError ( 1 time(s) )

conditional expression. at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.script.ScriptEvalUtil.compare(ScriptEvalUtil.java:277) ... 80 more
In highlight and map rules, user should use column binding expressions like: data["COUNTRY"], not olap expression: dimension["Group"]["COUNTRY"].
If the dimension["Group"]["COUNTRY"] expression couldn't be used in Highlight/map rule, they should be removed from the expression builder.
Fix it later, but not in RC4.

Remove "Current Data Cube" category from Map/Highlight page of Crosstab and CrosstabCell.
Fixed.

traces.message: An error happened in data type conversion.Invalid data type found in conditional expression.
Invalid data type found in conditional expression.
